subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Raul Ibanez, pinch-hitting for Alex Rodriguez, hit a home run in the ninth inning to tie the game and another in the 12th inning to give the Yankees a 2-1 series lead over the Orioles.
snippet: Raul Ibanez, pinch-hitting for Alex Rodriguez, hit a home run in the ninth inning to tie the game and another in the 12th inning to give the Yankees a 2-1 series lead over the Orioles.
